title: HELP!
body:
Hey Riot Support,

I've been wanting to post on the threads, but I haven't been able to because it says I'm level 1 when i'm actually level 30 in game. I have a feeling these two have little to no correlation. I was wondering if so how do i get my level up on the boards? 
Thank You!

replies.body:
Often times if you haven't used the boards in a long time, your Boards and Summoner profiles will have fallen out of sync. It seems this post forced a manual sync as you now show as level 30.

Happy posting!
